code: import React,{useState}from"react";import axios from"axios";import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";export default function CountryForm(_ref){let{onCountryAdded}=_ref;const[name,setName]=useState("");const[code,setCode]=useState("");const handleSubmit=async e=>{e.preventDefault();const res=await axios.post("http://localhost:4000/api/countries",{name,code});onCountryAdded(res.data);setName("");setCode("");};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("form",{onSubmit:handleSubmit,children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h3",{children:"Add Country"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{placeholder:"Name",value:name,onChange:e=>setName(e.target.value)}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{placeholder:"Code",value:code,onChange:e=>setCode(e.target.value)}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{type:"submit",children:"Save"})]});}
